title: Well-Meaning Parents are Setting their Children up for an Anxious Identity Crisis
description:
This from my larger conversation with my friends Kathryn and Eamon Wilson.


Discord link. Good for just a few days. Check with more recent videos for a fresh link. https://discord.gg/De8gqfJW
